item.title: SVL 1.9: Palo Alto and Cousins
item.description: 13th October 2014 Hello everyone, How are you? Hope you are doing well ðŸ™‚ Here the weather is getting so cold (13C) in the evenings and mornings that we’ve started keeping the windows closed at night.

item.title: The Relevance of Culture
item.description: A conversation with an old friend of mine revealed to me that the word culture is too often associated only with religion and ritualism and dismissed as irrelevant.
